title: Embedding related fixes
body_html:
This PR aims to

  • fix #2979 (adding functional EmbeddingBag
  • fix #3104 (missing docstring for keyword argument in Embedding)
  • fix a bug in Embedding docstring (calling variable[0].zero_() results in RuntimeError)
  • convert nn.EmbeddingBag to new style Function.

I've moved the core logic out of EmbeddingBag Module to the functional interface, since we would either have to dulpicate behaviour of forward. I hope this decision makes sense.
body_text:
This PR aims to

fix #2979 (adding functional EmbeddingBag
fix #3104 (missing docstring for keyword argument in Embedding)
fix a bug in Embedding docstring (calling variable[0].zero_() results in RuntimeError)
convert nn.EmbeddingBag to new style Function.

I've moved the core logic out of EmbeddingBag Module to the functional interface, since we would either have to dulpicate behaviour of forward. I hope this decision makes sense.
body:
This PR aims to 
* fix https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/2979 (adding functional `EmbeddingBag`
* fix https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3104 (missing docstring for keyword argument in Embedding)
* fix a bug in `Embedding` docstring (calling `variable[0].zero_()` results in `RuntimeError`)
* convert `nn.EmbeddingBag` to new style `Function`.

I've moved the core logic out of `EmbeddingBag` `Module` to the functional interface, since we would either have to dulpicate behaviour of `forward`. I hope this decision makes sense.
